documentation.text: @dev complete campaign and potentially refund business

campaignEnded().details: complete campaign and potentially refund business

params._postPosted: Check if post is posted and valid

depositPayment().details: used for injecting more money for campaigns you want to extend

overrideMaliciousCampaign().details: end campaign due to protest (in favour of business)

params._postPosted: Protested post must be valid post

removeGracePeriod(bool,bool).details: remove 12 hour grace period to allow shorter payouts

params._businessConfirmed: business confirms removal of grace period
params._influencerConfirmed: influencer confirms removal of grace period

resolveProtest().details: end campaign protest (in favour of influencer)
